content.html: Spring Modulith is something that excites me a bit more and it got lost a bit in the Java 17, native application and build tool discussion: spring.io/blog/2022/10/2… It excites me as it aims at better quality and maintainability. Congrats, Oliver @odrotbohm.
content.value:
Spring Modulith is something that excites me a bit more and it got lost a bit in the Java 17, native application and build tool discussion: spring.io/blog/2022/10/2… It excites me as it aims at better quality and maintainability. 
Congrats, Oliver @odrotbohm.
